tool.help:
.. class:: infomark
**Short description**
BioPax2SBML is a tool to translate files in Biological Pathway Exchange Language (BioPax) into System Biology Markup Language (SBML) files. BioPax Level 2 and Level 3 is supported and the translated SBML files include both reactions and relations, since the converter uses SBML Level 3 Version 1 with the Qualitative Models extension.
-----
.. class:: infomark
**How to use the tool**
- First you have to upload a model file in BioPax format. For this purpose, click the respective link in the left frame to start the upload tool - Select the BioPax file, which shall be converted by BioPax2SBML - Click "Execute" to convert the uploaded BioPax file - When the job has finished, click the "eye symbol" appearing in the history to display the result or click "save" to download the report file.
